verbs.description: < p > [V: Staging] [ARG1: a made - for - TV , still - of - the - night arrival ceremony] , President Donald Trump welcomed home three Americans freed by North Korea and declared their release a sign of promise toward his goal of de - nuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.</p >
